condition-display.and: AND: all conditions must be satisfied
condition-display.or: OR: any condition must be satisfied
condition-display.not: NOT: condition must not be satisfied

notes.description: Please check the following notes before playing
notes.p1: 1. Make sure you own all DLCs to ensure gameplay.
notes.p2: 2. When using the load order, remember to create a new profile.
notes.p3: 3. Open <0>{{config}}</0> and set <1>{{param}}</1> to 50 to ensure gameplay experience.
notes.title: Notes
